product_name: IGKGood Behavior Frizz & Flyaway Hair Taming Wand
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingInstantly tame frizz and flyaways, slick back styles, and detail edges - anytime, anywhere. IGK' innovative, wax-free formula delivers 24-hour frizz control and lasting hold - with no crunch, flaking, or residue. The smoothing XL wand tames flyaways and perfects styles with a soft, touchable finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsXL wand perfects slick back styles and tames flyaways24-Hour frizz controlWax-free formula provides hold with no residueKey IngredientsSpirulina Protein: Strengthens and boosts shineSnow Mushroom Extract: Hydrates and holds up to 500x weight in waterFormulated WithoutGlutenParabensSulfatesMineral OilSiliconePEGsItem 2643672How To UseFinish your slick back style, smooth flyaways, or detail edges using taming wand. Gently brush along frizz and flyaways in desired direction. Instantly touch up frizz and flyaways throughout the day.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, PVP, Arthrospira Platensis Extract, Tremella Fuciformis (Mushroom) Extract, Glycerin, Gluconolactone, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract, Polyglycerin-3, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-3 Cocoate, Polyglyceryl-6 Ricinoleate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Phytate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Finish your slick back style, smooth flyaways, or detail edges using taming wand. Gently brush along frizz and flyaways in desired direction. Instantly touch up frizz and flyaways throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Cool new product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] So I love this product, it really holds my hair down, and it doesn't leave residue. But I wish it lasted longer. It's smells ok and the packaging it's really cool.

reviews.headline: definitely a purchase
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] i looove this product - the packaging i wish it was bigger but it had no smell and i think the price is worth it. It can definitely hold the hair and is a clean product so love love love

reviews.headline: Works as advertised BUT leaves hair crusty
reviews.comments: is great at getting small flyaways and bigger longer pieces of hair. It does have a semi strong scent but it's not bad. If you apply it and use your hand to smooth it down more it puts a tacky residue on you. But it leaves your hair feeling crusty

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I've struggled with frizz and stubborn flyaways for years, and Good Behavior Frizz & Flyaway has been a total game changer. The formula is lightweight, non-sticky, and smooths everything down instantly without leaving my hair feeling greasy or stiff. What I love most is how natural it looksâ€”you don't see or feel any product buildup, just sleek, polished hair that stays put all day.

reviews.headline: Forever Love
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Love this! This will be something I purchase with my own money. It did the job, smelled nice and didn't flake on my hair. Awesome product. Definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: Instant Frizz Relief & Compact
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I thought the packaging was very cute and small enough to fit in a purse. The scent was also nice and not overpowering. I saw an immediate change in my frizz/fly aways as I applied the product. The ingredients seemed very clean and no lingering smell either. I think this is well worth the price and will be purchasing in the future.

reviews.headline: Will be buying again
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Yall this product smells so good. I love putting in my hair because it just instantly works and leaves me smelling great! The hold is ideal and the packaging allows me to toss it into any bag on the go. A must have, I'll be buying again.

reviews.headline: Great addition to your hairstyling needs!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] First, let me start off that I have very frizzy and static hair that likes to stick up nonstop and no matter what I do or amount of hairspray I put on my hair. It never seems to stay down. This wand is very good at taming my stand up pairs and and making them look a part of my actual hair. It's very easy to wash out. It doesn't feel hard. It's a very good product and I would highly recommend it. I use it in my daughter's hair too, and it helps stay during soccer practice and at soccer game so her hair is not on her face either.

reviews.headline: I like this product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Super easy to use. Smells good. Smooths down flyaways really well. Would likely purchase again in the future. I've seen multiple people using this and loving it as well!

reviews.headline: I need it in a bigger size!
reviews.comments: This absolutely amazing and works so well! It smells good and doesn't leave your hair hard/stiff like gel. The wand works so well for flyaways and I highly recommend this. I just wish it came in a bigger tube!

reviews.headline: Great hold
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love the IGK Good Behavior Frizz & Flyaway Taming Wand! It instantly smooths my hair, tames flyaways, and leaves it looking sleek without feeling sticky or heavy. The formula is lightweight and easy to apply, making it perfect for touch-ups throughout the day. Highly recommend for anyone wanting polished, frizz-free hair!

reviews.headline: A lifesaver for humid days
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This little wand is a lifesaver for my wild baby hairs. One quick swipe smooths everything down and it feels soft, not crunchy. I keep it in my bag for touch-ups during the day because it's so handy.

reviews.headline: Must have
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I'm really loving this product! I have never tried a frizz or flyaway tamer before and this one is amazing. I love the smell, it has a fruity but fresh scent. It is not sticky or slimy whatsoever the texture is amazing and it really controls your fly aways and locks them down! I will be getting this every time 10000%

reviews.headline: Great to tame frizz
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I live in a very humid climate, and this is a great product to tame frizz and flyaways. It has a faint, but pleasant scent. The packaging is very cute. Love the collage of words. There is a slight shine and greasiness when first applied.

reviews.headline: Really good product
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review This product  i used twice and think is a good product, help me with my little  hair and doesn't  have any fragance , good for travel or any event  , the packaging  is cute

reviews.headline: Long Lasting
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Love this. Will definitely buy moving forward. It adds great volume to my lashes and lasts for the whole day. I wore it for a long day of it and my lashes still looked like I just did it.

reviews.headline: Instantly Works & To Go Bottle
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I thought the packaging was very cute and small enough to fit in a purse. The scent was also nice and not overpowering. I saw an immediate change in my frizz/fly aways as I applied the product. The ingredients seemed very clean and no lingering smell either. I think this is well worth the price and will be purchasing in the future.

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I loved how it smell. The packs was really cute and unique and when I used the product it immediately made a difference. It was so easy to use and I can take it anywhere. It was cheap compared to other products but also good for my hair. The Ingredients included were not harmful for my hair.

reviews.headline: Good for waving hair
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The IGK Good Behavior Frizz & Flyaway Taming Wand is a lightweight, wax-free gel in an XL brush applicator that instantly smooths baby hairs, flyaways, and frizz. It gives sleek, polished results with a soft, touchable finishâ€”no flakes or residueâ€”and lasts up to 24 hours. Compact and easy to use, it's perfect for slick ponytails, edges, or on-the-go touch-ups. But the big thing I dont like is the smell of product

reviews.headline: Tame the flyaways
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I like the brush. It combs back flyaways well.  Feels sticky when first applied...after a few hours the hold wears off.  Leaves a shine to hair when applied also. Smells good though.

faceoff_positive.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I recently tried the IGK Good Behavior Frizz and Flyaway Taming Wand, and it's quickly become one of my go-to products for smoothing out those stubborn little hairs that never stay put. What I really like about it is how easy it is to use . it's basically like a mascara wand for your hair. I just brush it over the areas where I have flyaways, especially around my part and hairline, and everything lays down smoothly without looking stiff or greasy. The formula feels lightweight, so it doesn't weigh my hair down or make it crunchy like some gels or sprays can. Instead, it leaves a soft hold that lasts throughout the day. I've also noticed that it adds a bit of shine, which makes my hair look healthier and more polished. Another bonus is that the wand design makes it super portable. I can toss it in my bag and touch up quickly if I need to. For me, this works best when I've styled my hair straight or in a sleek ponytail or bun, since it really helps maintain that clean finish. On more textured or wavy days, it still helps keep frizz under control without interfering with my natural movement. Overall, I think this is a great product if you deal with frizz, baby hairs, or random flyaways and want something simple but effective to smooth them down.
faceoff_positive.headline: So good

faceoff_negative.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The packaging was very nice as I really liked the graphic design for IGK. The wand itself was like a big mascara wand with a tapered end for precise application. I absolutely loved the scent as it had a really nice floral scent to it. I used it by swiping the product one time on the sides of my hair to create a sleek ponytail look on my color treated hair. My hair is thin, naturally curly, 3a/3b, and prone to frizz. Upon initial application, it gave a wet look to my hair which made me a little nervous, but it dried down without looking crunchy or leaving a residue. It instantly smoothed my hair and I was able to brush through it to style it. However, it didn't hold down my baby hairs for more than a couple of hours indoors which was a little disappointing. If you live in a place with humidity, you may need to reapply to keep the hairs in place. I would say that this gives like light to medium hold in terms of performance.
faceoff_negative.headline: Good for simple hairstyles
